remarks: Lemma for ~ mbfmul .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
statement:
mbfmul.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
mbfmul.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. MblFn ) $.
mbfmul.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR ) $.
mbfmul.4 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> RR ) $.
mbfmul.5 $e |- ( ph -> P : NN --> dom S.1 ) $.
mbfmul.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( n e. NN |-> ( ( P ` n ) ` x ) ) ~~> ( F ` x ) ) $.
mbfmul.7 $e |- ( ph -> Q : NN --> dom S.1 ) $.
mbfmul.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( n e. NN |-> ( ( Q ` n ) ` x ) ) ~~> ( G ` x ) ) $.
mbfmullem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF x. G ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d F n x $.
$d G n x $.
$d P n x $.
$d Q n x $.
$d n ph x $.
